comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.rochester.lib.ny.us:2080/cgi-bin/cw_cgi?fullRecord+18... for a photo that shows this log cabin. Title Centennial parade with Enos Stone cabin float in 1912 Physical Details 1 negative : b&w ; 6 x 9 cm. (2 x 4 in.) Collection Rochester Public Library Local History Division picture file Summary People are gathered in the stands at Exposition Park for the Centennial Parade in 1912. In the center is a float representing the first dwelling built in Rochester, the log cabin of Enos Stone. Notes On sleeve: Negatives of pictures taken at Centennial Parade, Sept. 16, 1912. Edgerton Park. Note: negative made from a photograph dated 16 September 1912.
